parameter.name: MediLinkDBEntities-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: MediLinkDBEntities Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Server=tcp:medilinkdbdbserver.database.windows.net,1433; Initial Catalog=MediLinkDB; Persist Security Info=False; User ID=PortalAdmin; Password=MediLink2024; MultipleActiveResultSets=False; Encrypt=True; TrustServerCertificate=False; Connection Timeout=30;
